In England, in the seven days to 24 June, there were 77,902 new confirmed cases (137.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 June, there were 53,351 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 46% (24,551 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 June is 4,153,487 (7,344.8 cases per 100,000 population).
